service_name: Aphari IT Multi-Sourcing Service Integration and Management (SIAM) Capability Set-up
page_content:
Aphari Ltd

Aphari IT Multi-Sourcing Service Integration and Management (SIAM) Capability Set-up

Aphari helps organisations transform their IT operating model, adopt cloud services, implement multi source delivery models, establish systems integration and service integration (SIAM) capabilities. Our service integration and management setup service helps clients establish functions needed to support the multi-source environment - including ITIL processes, tooling, service performance and governance.

Features

  • Definition of service management approach against integrated best practice framework.
  • Definition of service scope and boundaries, processes, and performance measures.
  • Advice on tooling adoption and process automation.
  • Holistic approach across service, technical, financial, commercial and related functions.
  • ‘Big IT’ experience yet independent of suppliers and large consultancies.
  • Addresses specific concerns including supplier dependencies & multi-supplier performance management.
  • Deep expertise across all commercial, technical, security, and service domains.
  • Approach based on pragmatic application of public-domain best practices.
  • Our framework includes MOP, MSP/PRINCE, COBIT, TOGAF, ITIL, CCS guidance.
  • Can combine with other Aphari services including Set-up, Accelerators etc.

Benefits

  • Helps organisations transform their IT operating model and supply chain.
  • Helps clients manage multi-supplier service environments
  • Identifies service risks and issues based on 'real world' experience.
  • Highlights cross-functional inter relationships and lays foundations for structured collaboration.
  • Our methods and techniques proven in complex multi-supplier environments.
  • Highlights specific service management risks arising from multi-vendor service environments.
  • Recommends techniques and approaches for mitigating delivery and service risks.
  • No lock-in to proprietary or 'branded' methodologies.
  • Our holistic approach speaks to stakeholders in their own language.

Pricing

£950 per unit

  • Excluding VAT
  • Minimum contract period: Day
